author: djrtwo
content: Hi! We're starting with a single eip channel mapping to what we had on gitter. Lets see how things evolve. Happy to add more channels as things progress

author: sky.cactus
content:
Moving conversation here from private group chat:
<@543900561460822016> can you fix the bug in the EIP checker regarding casing in links?  Per URL specification, only the domain is case insensitive, path, query string, and anchor is all case sensitive.

author: lightclient
content: Ah I see this is coming from `html-proofer`. I'm working on replacing this in https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/2890

author: sky.cactus
content: Is `html-proofer` something that your EIP validator uses internally <@!543900561460822016>?

author: sky.cactus
content: I remember seeing in your PR that swapped out the validator that you had changed a bunch of links to be lowercase.  I assumed that was the same issue as <@!683653554631868440> brought up.

author: lightclient
content: Hmm, I'm not sure if I recall changing any links to lowercase. `html-proofer` has been a part of the CI for a while, unrelated to the EIP validator. It checks the static html pages jekyll exports before its deployed to github pages

author: sky.cactus
content: Oh, I must be mis-remembering, just re-reviewed your PR and I don't see what I claimed to have seen.  ðŸ˜¬

author: sky.cactus
content: <@!543900561460822016> any idea what these failures are about?  https://travis-ci.org/github/ethereum/EIPs/builds/686515567
